title: Looks familiar but I can't place it
content:
Any help would be appreciated.  
-j

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317091520im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Capture_4153.JPG)

Font: 

 Chicago 

Solved By: 

 [quadibloc](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317091520/http:/typophile.com/user/50554 "View user profile.")
author: jengart

comments.content:
This seems to be made in imitation of one of the old Macintosh dot matrix fonts.

Edit: [Chicago](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317091520/http:/www.identifont.com/similar?1O4) is the one I was thinking of. Your sample, though, is bolder and wider.
